block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 使用可变电阻器来设定仪表指针 use variable resistor to set gauge pointer
结果将是一个浮点数 如果需要，使用 round() 转换为整数 the result will be a floating number use round() to convert to integer if required

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap

scripts.comment: 模拟输入为 0 - 4095 使用公式转换为 0 - 180 analog input is 0 - 4095 use a formula to convert to 0 - 180
